com.solacesystems.jms

Class SolJmsUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solacesystems.jms.SolJmsUtility

  • public class SolJmsUtility
extends Object
    Utility functions for working with Solace JMS.

    • Method Detail

      • dumpMessage

        public static String dumpMessage(javax.jms.Message msg)
        Produces a human-readable dump of the message properties and its contents (can be quite large). Applications must not parse the output as its format is undefined.

        The textual dump includes JMS message fields and properties, followed by Solace-message-specific attributes as reported by the underlying messaging provider.

        Parameters:
        msg - A Solace JMS Message instance.
        Returns:
        A String representation of the message, to be used for debugging.

      • getMessageSize

        public static long getMessageSize(javax.jms.Message msg)
                           throws javax.jms.JMSException
        Gets the encoded size of the message payload in bytes. It is an approximate size because some message headers are not included. This method can only be used on a received message and throws a javax.jms.IllegalStateException for a message created using the local javax.jms.Session.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to get the payload size of.
        Returns:
        The encoded size of the message payload in bytes.
        Throws:
        javax.jms.JMSException - on error

      • toByteArray

        public static byte[] toByteArray(javax.jms.Message msg)
                          throws javax.jms.JMSException
        Serializes a JMS Message into a byte array.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to be serialized.
        Returns:
        The serialized message.
        Throws:
        javax.jms.JMSException - If conversion fails.

      • fromByteArray

        public static javax.jms.Message fromByteArray(byte[] data)
                                       throws javax.jms.JMSException
        Converts a byte array representing a serialized JMS Message into a JMS Message. The Bytes and Stream messages returned from this call are in write-only mode. An attempt to read the body of a Bytes or Stream message in this mode throws a MessageNotReadableException. Calling reset puts their bodies in read-only mode.
        Parameters:
        data - The serialized JMS Message.
        Returns:
        The JMS Message
        Throws:
        javax.jms.JMSException - If conversion fails.

      • createConnectionFactory

                                                                          throws Exception

        Returns:
        A Solace proprietary implementation of a ConnectionFactory.
        Throws:

      • createConnectionFactory

        public static com.solacesystems.jms.SolConnectionFactory createConnectionFactory(String host,
                                                                                 String username,
                                                                                 String password,
                                                                                 String vpn,
                                                                                 Hashtable<?,?> environment)
                                                                          throws Exception
        Creates a Solace proprietary implementation of a ConnectionFactory given connection parameters and an environment.
        Parameters:
        host - Appliance host to be used for any connections created from this factory.
        username - Appliance username to be used for any connections created from this factory.
        password - Appliance password to be used for any connections created from this factory.
        vpn - Appliance vpn to be used for any connections created from this factory.
        environment - Environment table
        Returns:
        A Solace proprietary implementation of a ConnectionFactory.
        Throws:
        Exception - on error

      • setReferenceableDelegate

        public static void setReferenceableDelegate(SolReferenceableDelegate referenceableDelegate)
        Sets the Referenceable delegate for ConnectionFactorys, Topics, and Queues. Setting the referenceable delgate means that whenever Referenceable.getReference() is called on a ConnectionFactory, Topic, or Queue the delegate will be called to return a Reference.
        Parameters:
        referenceableDelegate - The referenceable delegate

      • getReferenceableDelegate

        public static SolReferenceableDelegate getReferenceableDelegate()
        Gets the Referenceable delegate for ConnectionFactorys, Topics, and Queues. Setting the referenceable delgate means that whenever Referenceable.getReference() is called on a ConnectionFactory, Topic, or Queue the delegate will be called to return a Reference.
        Returns:
        the referenceable delegate
